containing_words.word: 中國石油天然氣集團公司

sentences.english: Have Chesapeake and other natural-gas producers survived the worst of the crisis?
sentences.chinese: 切薩皮克以及其他的天然氣公司真的挺過來了嗎？

sentences.english: Ukraine Gas Markets Investment Opportunities, Market Analysi…
sentences.chinese: 年烏克蘭天然氣市場分析預測研究報告。

sentences.english: By the end of 2001, natural gas conveyer pipeline can be laid down to our factory.
sentences.chinese: 2001年底，天然氣輸送管道即可鋪設至天津鹼廠。

sentences.english: Pinghu fault is the main passage for the vertical migration of oil and gas.
sentences.chinese: 平湖斷裂是天然氣垂向運移的主要通道。

sentences.english: Therefore, the recognition to gas beneficial zone of this region shows extraordinarily important.
sentences.chinese: 因此，對該區天然氣有利區帶的認識顯得非常重要。

sentences.english: Gas deposits were first identified in Yamal during Soviet times.
sentences.chinese: 亞馬爾的天然氣首先是在蘇聯時期得到確認。

sentences.english: The exploitation of natural gas and gas water in Sichuan Basin has a long history.
sentences.chinese: 四川盆地天然氣和氣田水開發歷史悠久。

sentences.english: Industrial exports include gold, mercury, uranium, and natural gas and electricity.
sentences.chinese: 工業出口包括黃金，汞，鈾，天然氣和電力。

sentences.english: The Russians have oil and gas —tons of it —and we need it.
sentences.chinese: 俄羅斯人有很多石油和天然氣，而我們需要這些東西。

sentences.english: Machang is situated at the central uplift zone in Dongpu seg abundant in natural gas in the southern area of the Yellow River.
sentences.chinese: 東濮凹陷黃河南地區具有豐富的天然氣資源。

sentences.english: Microleakage is one of the most important pathways in which the natural gas diffuses through caprocks .
sentences.chinese: 微滲漏是天然氣通過蓋層散失的重要方式之一。

sentences.english: The region may hold 2 quadrillion cubic feet of natural gas.
sentences.chinese: 該地區的天然氣儲量可能達2千萬億立方英尺。

sentences.english: Pigging operation is used extensively in gas pipelines.
sentences.chinese: 清管作業在天然氣管道中應用的越來越廣泛。

sentences.english: Chapter 5, It is mainly about accounting standards on dumping fees in oil and gas.
sentences.chinese: 第五章，主要是石油天然氣會計即對棄置費用的研究。

sentences.english: The natural gas enrichment of Jurassic depression in the west of Sichuan is mainly controlled by lithofacies.
sentences.chinese: 川西坳陷侏羅系天然氣富集主要受巖相控制。

sentences.english: Convert the gas into natural gas and sell it for residential heating and industrial use.
sentences.chinese: 將甲烷轉化成天然氣，用於住宅取暖和工業生產。

definition: fuel gas (coal gas, natural gas, methane etc)
to generate electricity/to send a telegram
running/operation (of airport, bus service, business etc)
